sentences.en: As long as I deliver the goods, my boss is very happy.
sentences.cn: 只要我做好本职工作，我的老板就很高兴。

sentences.en: Before leaving I delivered myself of a few choice comments.
sentences.cn: 离开之前，我发表了一些精心准备的评论

sentences.en: Do you deliver on Saturdays?
sentences.cn: 星期六你们送货吗？

sentences.en: He delivered a strong warning about the dangers facing the government.
sentences.cn: 他就政府所面临的危险发出了强烈警告。

sentences.en: He took the opportunity to deliver us another snub.
sentences.cn: 他借机再次冷落我们.

sentences.en: I have orders to deliver it to Mr Demiris personally.
sentences.cn: 我奉命要把它送给德米里斯先生本人。

sentences.en: I'll deliver myself of an opinion at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 我将在会上发表意见.

sentences.en: I'll order a special messenger to deliver the document.
sentences.cn: 我会派专人把文件送去.

sentences.en: I’m having some flowers delivered for her birthday.
sentences.cn: 我在安排人给她送花祝贺生日。

sentences.en: It is impossible to deliver this letter because the address is illegible.
sentences.cn: 由于地址字迹不清,致使信件无法投递.

sentences.en: My master ordered me not to deliver the message except in private.
sentences.cn: 我的主人命令我务必私下里传递消息。

sentences.en: She lapsed into a little girl voice to deliver a nursery rhyme.
sentences.cn: 她改用童声唱起童谣来。

sentences.en: The duty of a postman is to deliver letters and parcels.
sentences.cn: 送信和邮包是邮递员份内的事.

sentences.en: The enemy is going to deliver an attack during the dry season.
sentences.cn: 敌人准备在旱季发动攻势.

sentences.en: The king delivered a televised speech to the nation on November 5.
sentences.cn: 国王在11月5日向全国发表了电视讲话。

sentences.en: The morning mail has just been delivered.
sentences.cn: 早晨的邮件刚送到。

sentences.en: The president will deliver a speech about schools.
sentences.cn: 总统将就学校问题发表讲话。

sentences.en: They deliver to within a 5-mile radius of the store.
sentences.cn: 他们在距离商场5英里的范围内送货上门。

sentences.en: They rushed her to hospital where doctors delivered her baby.
sentences.cn: 他们急速将她送到医院，让医生给她接生。

sentences.en: Three judges will deliver their verdict in October.
sentences.cn: 3名法官将在10月份作出裁决。

sentences.en: We don'tpromise what we can't deliver.
sentences.cn: 我们承诺的就一定会兑现。

sentences.en: We pray to God to deliver us from evil.
sentences.cn: 我们祈求上帝把我们从罪恶中拯救出来.

words.tran_cn: 可以传送的；可交付使用的

trans.tran_cn: 发表，宣布，递送，交付，运载，履行，不负众望，托付，接生，投掷，把…瞄准，给予（打击），解救
trans.tran_en: to take goods, letters, packages etc to a particular place or person

trans.tran_cn: 投递， 送交； 送货； 发表， 宣布， 讲； 给接生， 帮助产下； 给予； 解救， 拯救
trans.tran_en: to take goods, letters, packages etc to a particular place or person
